com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class PolicyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.PolicyController

  • public class PolicyController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to Policy
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Salman Ahmad Ansari <10besesansari@seecs.edu.pk>, Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target appliedTarget
      A Target instance while updating an existing Policy instance.
      java.lang.String description
      A String variable to store the updated value of description attribute of the Policy instance specified by the selectedPolicy property.
      java.lang.String name
      A String variable to store the updated value of policyId attribute of the Policy instance specified by the selectedPolicy property.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule> ruleList
      An ArrayList of Rule used to display all the existing Rule instances that can be added to the Policy instance while updating it.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Policy selectedPolicy
      An instance of Policy used to store the Policy selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule selectedRule
      An instance of Rule used to store the Rule selected by the user from the user interface.

      PolicyController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addPolicy()
      Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy/Add/AddPolicy.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new Policy instance.
      void cancelUpdatePolicy()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing Policy instance.
      void deletePolicy()
      Deletes the instance of Policy stored in selectedPolicy property

      Deletes an instance of Rule stored in selectedRule property.

      boolean isAttrbtn()
      Returns FALSE if an instance of the Action is selected by the user otherwise TRUE.
      boolean isOperationFail()
      Returns FALSE if a Save button was pressed otherwise TRUE.
      void onPolicyUnSelect()
      Disables the buttons for adding Rule instances corresponding to an existing Policy instance.
      void ruleUnselect()
      Unselects the already selected Rule instance while updating an existing Policy instance.

      Saves the updated Policy instance in the database.

      Adds the selected Rule instances in the already existing Policy instance specified by the selectedPolicy property.

      Displays a message inside a Primefaces growl component in case of successful add operation.

      Displays a message inside a Primefaces growl component in case of successful update operation.

      Unselects the already selected Target instance while updating an existing Policy instance.

      Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy/Update/UpdatePolicy.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating an existing Policy instance.
      void updatePolicyRule()
      Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy/Add/AddRulePolicy.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new instance of @{code Rule} corresponding to an existing Policy instance.

    • Field Detail

      • selectedPolicy

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Policy selectedPolicy
        An instance of Policy used to store the Policy selected by the user from the user interface.

      • ruleList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule> ruleList
        An ArrayList of Rule used to display all the existing Rule instances that can be added to the Policy instance while updating it. This Policy instance is specified by the selectedPolicy property.

      • appliedTarget

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target appliedTarget
        A Target instance while updating an existing Policy instance.

        A String variable to store the updated value of policyId attribute of the Policy instance specified by the selectedPolicy property.

        public java.lang.String description
        A String variable to store the updated value of description attribute of the Policy instance specified by the selectedPolicy property.

      • selectedRule

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule selectedRule
        An instance of Rule used to store the Rule selected by the user from the user interface.

      • addPolicy

        public java.lang.String addPolicy()
        Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy/Add/AddPolicy.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new Policy instance.

        Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy/Update/UpdatePolicy.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating an existing Policy instance.

        Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy/Add/AddRulePolicy.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new instance of @{code Rule} corresponding to an existing Policy instance.
